channel.title: Using VPN afrter exit node
channel.description: So there are web sites I'd like to access inside Whonix that block all Tor exit nodes. My solution is to encrypt for VPN on my machine and then send through Tor and have exit node go through VPN to access the site. This way the IP will be the VPN and not a Tor exit node while keeping me anonymous. How would I configure this in Whonix? I'm using a Linux host OS with KVM running Whonix.

item.title: Using VPN afrter exit node
item.dc:creator: HiddenDev
item.description:
So there are web sites I’d like to access inside Whonix that block all Tor exit nodes. My solution is to encrypt for VPN on my machine and then send through Tor and have exit node go through VPN to access the site. This way the IP will be the VPN and not a Tor exit node while keeping me anonymous. How would I configure this in Whonix? I’m using a Linux host OS with KVM running Whonix.

Read full topic
